doctor.name: Dr. Md. Abdur Rahim
doctor.specialty: Piles, Anal Fisher, Fistula & Rectal Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Abdur Rahim is a Colorectal Surgeon in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), FMAS (India). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Abdur Rahim at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 1:30pm to 10pm (Everyday).

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal
